b34e2688-cd49-4cf8-94bc-9e3a80a07d7f.name: LinkBuds Fit Truly Wireless Noise Canceling Earbuds | Black
about_us: Secure and lightweight fit with Air Fitting Supporters for all-day comfort.
Exceptional sound quality for clear calls and distraction-free music.
Customize your LinkBuds Fit with accessories including supporters and case covers, in a variety of colors.
Stay connected with Ambient Sound Mode.
Customize your listening with the Sound Connect app.1
Auto Noise  Canceling Optimizer analyzes and adjusts based on your surroundings.
Experience Dynamic Driver X, designed to deliver wide frequency response for richer vocals and enhanced sound.
Up to 5.5 hours of battery life, with up to another 15.5 hours in the charging case.2

What's In The Box.SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES: Earbuds, Charging Case, USB Cable, Air Fitting Supporters (Pair), 4 Different Sized Earbud Tips

Always On: Experience unrivalled comfort with LinkBuds Fit featuring Air Fitting Supporters and ambient sound control. Personalize your pair with optional accessories in a range of colors to suit your style.
Keep every world on: Your favorite content is with you all the time. Comfortable, smart, and designed for real life, they keep you connected to the people and entertainment you love.
LinkBuds Fit x Olivia Rodrigo: The new LinkBuds Fit x Olivia Rodrigo were designed in collaboration with Olivia Rodrigo, with her fans in mind.
AT A GLANCE: All your favorite features in the box
All features: With Wide Area Tap, you can use double or triple taps in front of either of your ears to control your music playback, in addition to tapping the earbuds. This function allows you to tap with wider area  and make the operation easier.17, 18
Just take the earbuds off and the music stops. A built-in sensors knows when you're wearing them so simply put the earbuds back on and the music starts again.

Say “Hey Google” or “Alexa” to activate your preferred voice assistant.21 Listen to music, connect with friends, get notifications, set reminders, and more when connected to your smartphone. You can also use built-in voice control for noise cancellation, volume, and playback when connected to any device even when connecting to a PC.22

You can set Speak-to-Chat to automatically pause the music as soon as you speak to someone, so you can hear just ambient sound and conduct a conversation12 — handy if you want to keep your earbuds on or your hands are full. And once your chat is over, your music starts playing again automatically.24
You can operate your earbuds using natural head gestures, like receiving or declining calls19, or operating Auto Play20,21, by nodding or shaking your head.
In one tap, the LinkBuds Fit enables quick effortless Bluetooth® pairing with your Android™ devices.25 You can even check to see where you last used it, if misplaced.

Swift Pair makes it quick and easy to pair your headphones with your Windows 11 or Windows 10 laptop, desktop PC or tablet. When pairing mode is selected, a pop-up pairing guide will appear on nearby Windows 11 or Windows 10 devices.6

With up to 5.5 hours playback in the buds, and 3 full top-ups in the case, you can leave the house with up to 21 hours of total playback. If you are running short on time, a 5-minute quick charge provides up to an hour of playback.2
Open up the packaging of your LinkBuds Fit and you'll find 4 sizes of earbud tips to suit different ear shapes, air fitting supporters, and a USB-C® charging case.
With an IPX4 water resistance rating27, splashes and sweat won't stop these earbuds, so you can keep on moving to the music.
Designed for comfort: Small, light, and smart, with a secure and comfortable fit – even when exercising – thanks to the newly developed Air Fitting Supporters and earbud tips, to keep you connected throughout your day.
Comfortable and secure: LinkBuds Fit combines a shape that perfectly matches the human ear with an ergonomic design for a more stable fit. We’ve designed LinkBuds Fit utilizing extensive ear shape data collated since introducing the world’s first in-ear earbuds in 1982, as well as evaluation of the sensitivity of various types of ears to ensure an ideal shape that is comfortable for many people.
Air Fitting supporters: LinkBuds Fit feature our unique fitting supporters, with a tail that is soft and hollow to reduce ear contact and therefore pressure, while the point of attachment is hooked and hard, to prevent accidental dislodging. Combined, these encourage both comfort and security.
Soft Fitting Earbud Tips: The earpiece’s overall height is lower and its structure is sealed at a shallower point in the ear canal. The earpiece is also made of a soft silicone, which contributes to reduced pressure and improved tracking performance.
Lightweight and compact: Small in size yet with better audio quality, LinkBuds Fit earbuds weigh approximately  4.9g.4 The earbuds are so light and rest easily in your ears so you can enjoy your favorite content comfortably, all day long.2
Colors to suit your style: LinkBuds Fit are available in a range of colors to fit your wardrobe, with the white and green editions including a unique marbled pattern on the case. Pair with optional Air Fitting Supporters and case covers for even more variety.3
Your color, your rules: Choose from a range of Air Fitting Supporter and case cover accessories, in a variety of colors, to customize LinkBuds Fit to your unique style.3,5
An stylish case design: We've updated the classic LinkBuds case design, with a lid that's now easy to open and close in any orientation and an open posture that exudes class. The white and green feature a unique marbled pattern, manufactured so that no two cases are exactly alike.
What's your color?: Customize your look, by choosing your unique covers before you add to cart.
Stay connected with Ambient Sound Mode: LinkBuds Fit combines excellent noise canceling with an improved Ambient Sound Mode. When activated, it automatically adjusts to your environment, reducing excess noise while keeping you safe and aware of your surroundings.
Auto Ambient Sound: Automatic, adaptable: Our Auto Ambient Sound mode adjusts ambient sound to match your surroundings. Multiple microphones process and suppress ambient noise so you can comfortably enjoy your music anywhere. Or filter through important sounds like announcements and conversations, to keep you fully connected. Dynamic adjustment allows the earbuds to automatically adapt to changing sounds in your environment, or manually adjust the noise sensitivity in the Sony | Sound Connect app, for mode switching with quick taps.
Adjusts to the world around you: Adaptive Sound Control senses where you are and what you’re doing, then uses AI to change ambient sound settings for the ideal listening experience. Over time, it can learn your behavior, recognize locations you visit often, and tailor the sound to suit your location.
Immersive audio and call clarity: It’s easier than ever to stay connected to the people and content you love. Enjoy your favorite music without distractions, and exceptional call quality even in noisy environments.
Enjoy richer, more detailed vocals: Our proprietary Dynamic Driver X is specifically designed to deliver a wide frequency response, for richer vocals and enhanced fine details. The diaphragm structure, which is also used with the WF-1000XM5, combines several different materials for the dome and the edge, achieving low distortion and a clear sound quality.
Advanced Noise Canceling: The LinkBuds Fit are equipped with our Integrated Processor V2, just like in our acclaimed WF-1000XM5, to optimize noise canceling in real time according to your environment. Plus, its dual noise sensor technology filters exterior sound using multiple microphones, for greater immersion. Auto NC Optimizer analyzes your surroundings to constantly adjust and optimize noise canceling wherever you are.
Enjoy High-Resolution Audio without wire: LinkBuds Fit supports High-Resolution Audio Wireless, thanks to LDAC™, our industry-adopted audio coding technology. LDAC transmits approximately three times more data than conventional Bluetooth® audio, allowing you to enjoy High-Resolution Audio content in exceptional quality, as close as possible to that of a dedicated wired connection.7, 8
Real-time restoration of all your compre: Using Edge-AI (Artificial Intelligence), DSEE Extreme™ upscales compressed digital music files in real time. Dynamically recognizing instrumentation, musical genres and individual elements of each song, it restores high range sound lost in compression.9
Ultra clear calls: With Precise Voice Pickup Technology that optimally controls microphones on the outside and inside of the earbud, and advanced audio signal processing, conversations are ultra clear, even in noisy environments. Our noise reduction algorithm was developed with AI machine learning using over 500 million voice samples to suppress ambient noise and extract your voice clearly.
A new sound experience for AR gaming: LinkBuds Fit uses new sensors and spatial sound technology to deliver immersive sound for Augmented Reality games like "Ingress" from Niantic.8,9When playing "Ingress" with the LinkBuds Fit, sensor and spatial sound technologies deliver a new experience: using head tracking, the sound is conveyed from different directions to line up perfectly with the action on the screen. Experience the immersive tracking for yourself with this simulation.
Head tracking function: Head tracking ensures a realistic and compelling listening experience by automatically adjusting sound fields to compensate for your head movement. Sounds are precisely aligned with your earbuds, even as you move, to completely involve you in your listening, when paired with compatible devices and services10.
Certified earbuds for a personalized exp: With 360 Reality Audio Certified earbuds and our Sony | Sound Connect app you can optimize your experience by analyzing your individual ear shape to enjoy the ultimate immersive music experience.11An advanced personal optimization algorithm gives an even greater sense of sound space, distance and height, allowing you to become even more immersed in the music.
A personal cinematic experience when pai: Enjoy a thrilling Dolby Atmos® experience and 360 Spatial Sound that adapts to your ears with BRAVIA™ and these earbuds12.
360 Spatial Sound Personalizer: With the Sony | 360 Sound Connect app, you’ll enjoy a sound experience that’s optimized for you.11, 12 The app captures and analyzes your ear shape, allowing these earbuds to create your spatial sound field when paired with selected BRAVIA TVs.
Total convenience, total customization: LinkBuds Fit are even better with the Sony | Sound Connect app.1 Its simple, intuitive interface lets you dial in your ideal sound and shortcut settings. Listening History lets you track the music you listen to in different scenarios–so you can see where you were when you listened to a specific song, and so on. Finally, Safe Listening lets you check to see if your listening habits are long-term hearing-friendly.
Switch playback between your LinkBuds Fit and LinkBuds Speaker seamlessly with Auto Switch. Simply place your earbuds back in their case when you’re near the Speaker and playback will continue on the Speaker. Then switch back when you take your earbuds out again for on-the-go listening.
Quick Access: A shortcut to your music with a few simple taps and no need to touch your smartphone.13, 14, 15 You can enjoy your music in an effortless way.
Experience Auto Play: Auto Play delivers music and audio notifications exactly when you need them. For example, playback will start automatically once you put your headphones in–without needing to use your smartphone. Auto Play can also play the right music for the right moment, based on your daily routine; whether that's your daily walk, your gym workout, or your daily commute. Plus, Voice Cue lets you receive important information without missing out. you can enjoy your favorite contents seamlessly in various scenes of your lifestyle.16
Background Music Effect: When activated, the Background Music Effect uses Digital Signal Processing (DSP) to make audio sound as though it’s playing in your space, rather than feeling like it’s localized in your head. The effect is perfect for when you’re doing other tasks, or want something a little less intense.
Multipoint Connection: For total convenience, these Bluetooth® earbuds can be paired with two Bluetooth devices at the same time. When a call comes in, your earbuds know which device is ringing and connects to the right one automatically.6
Next-generation Bluetooth\u00ae audio: These earbuds are ready for LE Audio (Beta version), a next-generation Bluetooth® audio that enables ultra-low latency, ideal for gaming.26 They also include support for Auracast™ broadcast audio to easily connect with others to broadcast in public spaces, or shared Bluetooth® soundtracks.6
A clearer, more stable Bluetooth signal: For low latency and high sound quality, even around interference, the Bluetooth® signal is transmitted to both ears at the same time. Thanks to the powerful Integrated Processor V2, you'll enjoy stable, skip-free, wireless sound.
Thoughtfully designed for a sustainable: Sony is committed to preserving the Earth while delivering superior sound quality. With a goal of achieving a zero environmental footprint by 2050, Sony is accelerating green initiatives. The LinkBuds Fit earbuds and charging case incorporate recycled plastic materials , and the packaging contains no plastic, reflecting Sony's dedication to reducing environmental impact.28, 29
Accessibility: We believe technology should make the world more interactive, more creative, more entertaining, and more inclusive. By incorporating human-centric, inclusive designs into our audio products, we deliver our Kando experience to all our users, regardless of age, ability, or environment.
